policies.moderation.title: Moderation Policy
How do moderators moderate the server?
The server abides by a 3-warn moderation policy, enforced by the server's guides.
policies.moderation.points.breach.title: Where do the rules apply?
policies.moderation.points.breach.descri: The server rules apply to the entirety of the server, and a breach thereof will result in a warning being issued.
policies.moderation.points.warnings.titl: What happens if I get warned a few times?
policies.moderation.points.warnings.desc: If a user has already received three warnings, the fourth warning will cause the user to be timed out. Warnings expire after a period of __two months__.
policies.moderation.points.furtherAction: Consequently, the server staff will be informed of the limit being passed and, subsequently, will review the circumstances and determine an appropriate course of action.
policies.moderation.points.ban.title: What if I don't care?
policies.moderation.points.ban.descripti: In case of it having been found that a user had knowingly and constantly been breaking the server rules and/or ignoring suggestions of the staff, the user will be permanently banned from the server.
